mapper.select: select id,RealName,Sex,rgdate,Course,Teacher,Classnum,phone,Fee,(select SUM(case when Company =#{c} and realname=student.realname then paid + money else 0 end) from payment ) mall ,ifnull(Fee,0) -ifnull((select SUM(case when Company =#{c} and realname=student.realname then paid + money else 0 end) from payment ),0) as Nocost,(select SUM(case when Company=#{c} and student_name=student.realname and course=student.Course then keshi else 0 end ) from keshi_detail ) nall,ifnull(Allhour,0) - ifnull((select SUM(case when Company=#{c} and student_name=student.realname and course=student.Course then keshi else 0 end ) from keshi_detail ),0) as Nohour,Allhour,Type FROM student where Company =#{c} and ifnull(Fee,0) -ifnull((select SUM(case when Company =#{c} and realname=student.realname then paid else 0 end) from payment ),0) > 0

SELECT s.id, s.RealName, s.Sex, s.rgdate, s.Course, s.Teacher, s.Classnum, s.phone, s.Fee, ISNULL(p.mall, 0) as mall, ISNULL(s.Fee, 0) - ISNULL(p.mall, 0) as Nocost, ISNULL(k.nall, 0) as nall, ISNULL(s.Allhour, 0) - ISNULL(k.nall, 0) as Nohour, s.Allhour, s.Type FROM student s LEFT JOIN ( SELECT realname, ISNULL(SUM(paid + money), 0) as mall FROM payment WHERE Company = #{c} GROUP BY realname ) p ON s.RealName = p.realname LEFT JOIN ( SELECT student_name, course, ISNULL(SUM(keshi), 0) as nall FROM keshi_detail WHERE Company = #{c} GROUP BY student_name, course ) k ON s.RealName = k.student_name AND s.Course = k.course WHERE s.Company = #{c} AND ISNULL(s.Fee, 0) - ISNULL(p.mall, 0) > 0
